definition: to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots

sentences.english: Your shortstop will never forget about practice again.
sentences.chinese: 您的游击手将永远不会忘记的再实践。

sentences.english: Laurier : I never forgot her cry.
We must work hard to forget that I love to search for you.
sentences.chinese: 要多努力才能忘记让我爱到深入骨髓的你。

sentences.english: I will not forget God's Word.
After going only a mile or so, they realized they had forgotten the milking stools.
sentences.chinese: 走了大约一英里，他们发现挤奶用的凳子忘记拿了。

sentences.english: My little brother always forgets to wash behind his ears.
sentences.chinese: 我的小弟弟老是忘记洗耳后根。

sentences.english: Have you and joan forgotten our dinner date?
sentences.chinese: 你和简忘记我们的晚捕缂会了吗？

sentences.english: I will say unto God my rock, Why hast thou forgotten me?
sentences.chinese: 我要对神我的磐石说，你为何忘记我呢。

sentences.english: If you always forget what the heck IIRC stands for, here's where to look.
sentences.chinese: 如果你总是忘记那鬼IIRC代表什么，去这里查看。

sentences.english: What if forget or lose the code?
sentences.chinese: 如果忘记或丢失密码怎么办？

sentences.english: Only my work helped me forget what I was seeing. "——H. S."
sentences.chinese: 只有我的工作让我忘记所见到的情景。

sentences.english: Remember, we ourselves are descendants of immigrants too.
sentences.chinese: 不要忘记，我们也是移民的后代。

sentences.english: Never forget your best friends in America.
sentences.chinese: 永远不要忘记你在美利坚合众国的好伴侣。

sentences.english: I almost forgot that cordless phones can't be taken out of the house.
sentences.chinese: 我几乎忘记了无绳电话不能拿到室外。

sentences.english: Don't forget to indicate before turning.
sentences.chinese: 拐弯之前别忘记指示车行方向。

definition: to remember/to bear in mind/to learn by heart
to recall/to think of/to call to mind
to be forgotten/to fade from memory
to know/to become aware of/also pr. [zhi1 dao5]
